channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Google’s AI Mode gets new agentic capabilities to help book event tickets and beauty appointments
item.description: For example, you can ask "find me 2 cheap tickets for the Shaboozey concert coming up. prefer standing floor tickets." AI Mode will then search across multiple websites to find real-time ticket options that meet your specific requests.

item.title: The Arduboy credit card-sized Game Boy now supports multiplayer over USB
item.description: After debuting a matchbox-sized handheld called the Arduboy Mini and a banana-shaped version of the original Arduboy, creator Kevin Bates has announced a new model of Arduboy FX called the FX-C with some welcome upgrades and new color options. For the first time, the credit card-sized Arduboy now has a USB-C port for charging, syncing, […]

item.title: Sequoia names Alfred Lin and Pat Grady as new Co-Stewards as Roelof Botha steps down
item.description: Just over three years after taking the reins as the steward of the storied firm, Both passed the leadership button to Lin and Grady.

item.title: ‘The Mummy’ Is Returning With Original Stars Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz
item.description: Stars of the beloved 1999 reboot and its sequel are returning to the Universal Monster franchise.

item.title: Nvidia is building an "AI Megafactory" for Samsung with 50,000 GPUs - could this be the start of a new AI dawn?
item.description: Samsung’s AI Megafactory aims to unify semiconductor, robotics, and digital twin systems, all powered by Nvidia GPUs.

item.title: Un phénomène rare observé en direct : des anneaux sont en train de naître autour d’un astre du Système solaire !
item.description: Galilée a le premier observé les anneaux de Saturne avec sa lunette, mais sans comprendre vraiment leur nature. Depuis, on en a trouvé autour de bien des corps célestes du Système solaire. Il semblerait que certains sont en cours de formation. Ce qui est sûr, c'est que même des astronomes...

item.title: The Most-Hated MacBook Could Return Without the Same Compromises
item.description: Apple is reportedly working on a do-over.

item.title: The "class-leading" DJI Osmo Pocket 3 just got a massive $200 discount at Best Buy
item.description: The DJI Osmo Pocket 3 just got a huge saving of $200 in Best Buy’s early Black Friday deals.

item.title: 12 Classic Cartoons to Stream for Free, and Where to Find Them
item.description: 'Looney Tunes,' 'My Little Pony,' 'Transformers,' 'Strawberry Shortcake,' and more are available to watch without a paid subscription.

item.title: Deck your house in Govee’s smart string lights, which are cheaper ahead of the holidays
item.description: Now that spooky season’s over, it’s time to swap the pumpkins and skeletons for something a little more cheery ahead of the holidays. Govee’s Christmas Lights 2 are customizable string lights that will add some smart home magic to your tree, with plenty of slack left over to adorn your space. Right now, they’re discounted […]

item.title: Databricks research reveals that building better AI judges isn't just a technical concern, it's a people problem
item.description: The intelligence of AI models isn't what's blocking enterprise deployments. It's the inability to define and measure quality in the first place.That's where AI judges are now playing an increasingly important role. In AI evaluation, a "judge" is an AI system that scores outputs from another AI system. Judge Builder is Databricks' framework for creating judges and was first deployed as part of the company's Agent Bricks technology earlier this year. The framework has evolved significantly since its initial launch in response to direct user feedback and deployments.Early versions focused on tech...

item.title: Legendary CD-ROM maker has best value SSD pre-Black Friday: RiDATA 2TB Gen4 SSD costs only $106 and, surprise, surprise, has SLC cache
item.description: This $105.99 RiDATA A801 2TB NVMe SSD is one of the best sub-$110 Gen 4 drives available, delivering speeds up to 5000 MB/s and outperforming many pricier models.

item.title: Walmart's official Black Friday sale starts next week – here's how to get early access
item.description: Walmart's 2025 Black Friday sale kicks off next week - here's how to get early access, plus preview the official Walmart Black Friday Ad with the top deals I'd buy.

item.title: Attention ISN'T all you need?! New Qwen3 variant Brumby-14B-Base leverages Power Retention technique
item.description: When the transformer architecture was introduced in 2017 in the now seminal Google paper "Attention Is All You Need," it became an instant cornerstone of modern artificial intelligence. Every major large language model (LLM) — from OpenAI's GPT series to Anthropic's Claude, Google's Gemini, and Meta's Llama — has been built on some variation of its central mechanism: attention, the mathematical operation that allows a model to look back across its entire input and decide what information matters most.Eight years later, the same mechanism that defined AI’s golden age is now showing its limits. ...

item.title: Sora is now available on Android in the US, Canada, and other regions
item.description: The Sora app is now available for Android users in the US, Canada, and Japan, among other regions.

item.title: Teachers Get Death Threats After MAGA Claims Their Halloween Costumes Mocked Charlie Kirk
item.description: A Turning Point USA official inaccurately claimed a high school's math department wore Halloween costumes that mocked Charlie Kirk. Those teachers are now facing a flood of online attacks and death threats.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Briefly Falls Below $100,000, a 20% Decline Since October’s High
item.description: The decline mirrors anxiety about the future of tech stocks.

item.title: FBI Warns of Criminals Posing as ICE, Urges Agents to ID Themselves
item.description: In a bulletin to law enforcement agencies, the FBI said criminal impersonators are exploiting ICE’s image and urged nationwide coordination to distinguish real operations from fakes.

item.title: After the FDA crackdown, here’s how some companies are still selling GLP-1s
item.description: A new “microdosing” trend lets pharmacies offer compounded versions of GLP-1 drugs even after the FDA declared the shortage over. Microdosing isn’t just about mushrooms any more.

item.title: Microsoft is finally clamping down on scam attacks with new "scareware" sensor - here's what you need to know
item.description: Microsoft Edge gains a new scareware sensor and default AI blocker to protect users from tech support scams before they spread.

item.title: Apple active finalement la traduction en direct pour les AirPods en Europe
item.description: Apple va finalement activer la traduction en temps réel des AirPods dans l'Union européenne. Une fonction lancée partout ailleurs dans le monde depuis iOS 26, mais que le constructeur ne voulait pas lancer sur le vieux continent en raison du règlement sur les marchés numériques (DMA). La nouveauté sera disponible courant décembre avec iOS 26.2.

item.title: ‘Destiny 2’ Is Adding So Many ‘Star Wars’ Guns
item.description: 'Renegades,' the 'Star Wars'-inspired upcoming expansion for Bungie's sci-fi shooter, will bring you plenty of firepower from a galaxy far, far away... and, of course, a certain laser sword.

item.title: Fitbit still has a place in the smartwatch era – just look at the Apple Watch SE 3
item.description: Why testing the Apple Watch SE 3 got me excited for next year's Fitbit release.

item.title: Ever update and shut down your Windows 11 PC, and it restarts instead? Yeah, you're not seeing things – Microsoft confirms it was a bug
item.description: Finally, this annoying bug is gone

item.title: OpenAI launches its Sora app on Android
item.description: OpenAI has brought its AI video app, Sora, to Android. The app, which lets you create, share, and remix AI-generated videos, is now available on the Google Play Store in the US, Canada, Japan, Korea, Taiwan, Thailand, and Vietnam, according to an announcement on Tuesday. OpenAI launched Sora on iOS in September, with the app […]

item.title: Our Favorite Gaming Headset for Xbox Owners Is Discounted
item.description: Save almost $20 on Microsoft's first-party headset for Xbox Series S/X.
